verses.text_plain: What advantage then hath the Jew? or what profit is there of circumcision?
verses.verse_html: 1What advantage then hath the Jew? or what profit is there of circumcision?

verses.text_plain: Much every way: chiefly, because that unto them were committed the oracles of God.
verses.verse_html: 2Much every way: chiefly, because that unto them were committed the oracles of God.

verses.text_plain: For what if some did not believe? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect?
verses.verse_html: 3For what if some did not believe? shall their unbelief make the faith of God without effect?

verses.text_plain: God forbid: yea, let God be true, but every man a liar; as it is written, That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings, and mightest overcome when thou art judged.
verses.verse_html: 4God forbid: yea, let God be true, but every man a liar; as it is written, That thou mightest be justified in thy sayings, and mightest overcome when thou art judged.

verses.text_plain: But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God, what shall we say? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance? (I speak as a man)
verses.verse_html: 5But if our unrighteousness commend the righteousness of God, what shall we say? Is God unrighteous who taketh vengeance? (I speak as a man)

verses.text_plain: God forbid: for then how shall God judge the world?
verses.verse_html: 6God forbid: for then how shall God judge the world?

verses.text_plain: For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory; why yet am I also judged as a sinner?
verses.verse_html: 7For if the truth of God hath more abounded through my lie unto his glory; why yet am I also judged as a sinner?

verses.text_plain: And not rather, (as we be slanderously reported, and as some affirm that we say,) Let us do evil, that good may come? whose damnation is just.
verses.verse_html: 8And not rather, (as we be slanderously reported, and as some affirm that we say,) Let us do evil, that good may come? whose damnation is just.

verses.text_plain: What then? are we better than they? No, in no wise: for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles, that they are all under sin;
verses.verse_html: 9What then? are we better than they? No, in no wise: for we have before proved both Jews and Gentiles, that they are all under sin;

verses.text_plain: As it is written, There is none righteous, no, not one:
verses.verse_html: 10As it is written, There is none righteous, no, not one:

verses.text_plain: There is none that understandeth, there is none that seeketh after God.
verses.verse_html: 11There is none that understandeth, there is none that seeketh after God.

verses.text_plain: They are all gone out of the way, they are together become unprofitable; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.
verses.verse_html: 12They are all gone out of the way, they are together become unprofitable; there is none that doeth good, no, not one.

verses.text_plain: Their throat is an open sepulchre; with their tongues they have used deceit; the poison of asps is under their lips:
verses.verse_html: 13Their throat is an open sepulchre; with their tongues they have used deceit; the poison of asps is under their lips:

verses.text_plain: Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness:
verses.verse_html: 14Whose mouth is full of cursing and bitterness:

verses.text_plain: Their feet are swift to shed blood:
verses.verse_html: 15Their feet are swift to shed blood:

verses.text_plain: Destruction and misery are in their ways:
verses.verse_html: 16Destruction and misery are in their ways:

verses.text_plain: And the way of peace have they not known:
verses.verse_html: 17And the way of peace have they not known:

verses.text_plain: There is no fear of God before their eyes.
verses.verse_html: 18There is no fear of God before their eyes.

verses.text_plain: Now we know that what things soever the law saith, it saith to them who are under the law: that every mouth may be stopped, and all the world may become guilty before God.
verses.verse_html: 19Now we know that what things soever the law saith, it saith to them who are under the law: that every mouth may be stopped, and all the world may become guilty before God.

verses.text_plain: Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.
verses.verse_html: 20Therefore by the deeds of the law there shall no flesh be justified in his sight: for by the law is the knowledge of sin.

verses.text_plain: But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets;
verses.verse_html: 21But now the righteousness of God without the law is manifested, being witnessed by the law and the prophets;

verses.text_plain: Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:
verses.verse_html: 22Even the righteousness of God which is by faith of Jesus Christ unto all and upon all them that believe: for there is no difference:

verses.text_plain: For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;
verses.verse_html: 23For all have sinned, and come short of the glory of God;

verses.text_plain: Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:
verses.verse_html: 24Being justified freely by his grace through the redemption that is in Christ Jesus:

verses.text_plain: Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God;
verses.verse_html: 25Whom God hath set forth to be a propitiation through faith in his blood, to declare his righteousness for the remission of sins that are past, through the forbearance of God;

verses.text_plain: To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.
verses.verse_html: 26To declare, I say, at this time his righteousness: that he might be just, and the justifier of him which believeth in Jesus.

verses.text_plain: Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.
verses.verse_html: 27Where is boasting then? It is excluded. By what law? of works? Nay: but by the law of faith.

verses.text_plain: Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law.
verses.verse_html: 28Therefore we conclude that a man is justified by faith without the deeds of the law.

verses.text_plain: Is he the God of the Jews only? is he not also of the Gentiles? Yes, of the Gentiles also:
verses.verse_html: 29 Is he the God of the Jews only? is he not also of the Gentiles? Yes, of the Gentiles also:

verses.text_plain: Seeing it is one God, which shall justify the circumcision by faith, and uncircumcision through faith.
verses.verse_html: 30Seeing it is one God, which shall justify the circumcision by faith, and uncircumcision through faith.

verses.text_plain: Do we then make void the law through faith? God forbid: yea, we establish the law.
verses.verse_html: 31Do we then make void the law through faith? God forbid: yea, we establish the law.
